translation.en: [Asha] My name is Asha Maurya.
And I have a joyous appetite for life.
I'm patient.
Resourceful.
And I’m a natural in the kitchen.
Motherly at heart, I yearn to have a family to feed.

translation.en: An economist by day,
I live a quiet, traditional life by night.
My hobbies include fine dining
and relaxing at home.
A natural-born athlete,
with boundless energy.
I'm seeking my Indian Prince Charming…
…with a professional job and MBA.
At heart, I'm just a simple girl
who loves weddings.
♪ Do it in the pictures Show me love ♪ ♪ And what's it gonna be ♪
And I dream of having a grand one of my own someday.

translation.en: Don't do it.
-[man] Look alive. Meeting's in 20. -Huh?
“Singapore equals economic miracle.”
Brilliant.
Please tell me you've slept.
Oh. Yeah, I slept. I slept for 56 minutes.
Asha, stop killing yourself. This is what you've been waiting for.
It's all on you.
Now, get it together and prove to my boss in London

translation.en: that I'm a genius for stealing you from Wall St.

translation.en: Your investment is key to establishing our Southeast Asia loan initiative.

translation.en: Which would launch Singapore as a powder…
…ful, powerful…
Powder…
Pow… Powerful--

No, of course not.
Uh, definitely not. Definitely not.
The…
This is your chance to establish Singapore as a center--

Mom!

Ravi.

Ravi!

A love that our…

translation.en: [whispers] It's just not gonna happen. Over and out.
So, Veena, Dinesh. We may have another wedding in our future.
translation.ko: 비나, 디네시, 다음 결혼식은 우리들 집안일지 몰라요

translation.en: Pooja Patel heard from Pinky that they went straight from fizzle to sizzle.
translation.ko: 푸자 파텔이 핑키한테 들었는데 꺼진 불에서 지글거리는 불로 바뀌었다네요

translation.en: -So let's start planning a date! -What?
[Veena] I told you!
Oh, after all these years of hoping, planning, praying, finally!
translation.ko: 수년간의 희망, 계획 기도 끝에 이런 날이!

translation.en: Let's not get ahead of ourselves. Pooja is a number one rascal.
translation.ko: 너무 앞서가지 말죠 푸자는 장난이 심해요

translation.en: I just know my Ravi's happier than he's ever been.
translation.ko: 라비가 그 어느 때보다 행복하단 걸 알아요

translation.en: I told him, "Just meet Asha."
"She's such a good girl. What's the harm?" Now, see?
translation.ko: 좋은 애잖아요 나쁠 게 뭐 있어요? 봤지?

translation.en: They think our way of doing things is old-fashioned and silly.
translation.ko: 우리 방식이 구식이고 어리석은 줄 안다니까요

translation.en: Asha says our thinking is stuck in the India of 40 years ago.
translation.ko: 아샤는 저희 사고방식이 40년 전 인도 방식이래요

translation.en: But Asha became an economist like her old man. That's something.
translation.ko: 근데 아샤는 아버지처럼 경제 전문가가 됐잖아요, 대단해요

translation.en: But she's too idealistic.
I admire you, Dinesh.
Running this restaurant, putting Ravi through college.
translation.ko: 이 식당을 운영하면서 라비를 대학까지 보내고

translation.en: It's no small feat.
I wanted more than this for him. [chuckles]
So tell us more about Ravi's company.
translation.ko: 라비의 회사 얘기 더 들려줘 봐요

translation.en: You know these start-ups, huh? So secretive.
-[Suneeta chuckles] -Who knows what he does.
translation.ko: 스타트업 아시죠? 베일에 싸여 있어요 뭘 하는지 누가 알겠어요

translation.en: Say no more. Asha doesn't want to tell us anything about her new job either.
translation.ko: 잘 알죠, 아샤도 새 직장 얘기는 전혀 안 해줘요

translation.en: To our kids who think their parents know nothing.
translation.ko: 부모가 아무것도 모른다고 생각하는 자식들을 위해 건배하죠

translation.en: What would they do without us, huh?
-Cheers! -Cheers!
-They'd be penniless. -And barren.
[Tina] Okay, listen to this one.
Her alcoholic husband walked out right after their son was born.
translation.ko: 알코올 중독자 남편이 아들이 태어나자마자 집을 나갔대요

translation.en: So then we gave her a loan to open a tea shop.
Her son became the first in her family to go to high school.
translation.ko: 아들은 집안에서 처음으로 고등학교에 가게 됐고요

translation.en: Yeah, you know what this means? These loans were her lucky break.
translation.ko: 이게 무슨 뜻인지 알죠? 대출이 행운의 열쇠였어요

translation.en: Now that's a story to believe in.
translation.ko: 바로 그게 신뢰할 수 있는 이야기지

translation.en: What are you all smiley, smiley about?
-The suits are coming back. -Singapore?
Yes!
-In a few weeks. -No!
Okay, just… I gotta get to work then.
Exactly. But not here.
One of our big donors is having a soiree and you're going to be my wingwoman.
translation.ko: 거액 기부자 중 1명이 파티를 여니까 나랑 같이 가줘

translation.en: That is if you don't have another wedding.
Oh, I did, but I told Ravi I have a sinus infection, so…
translation.ko: 물론 있죠, 근데 라비한테 축농증이 있다고 해놨어요

translation.en: Oh, that's a great plan. Fake being sick to fake out your fake boyfriend.
translation.ko: 계획 좋네요 가짜 남자 친구를 속이려고 아픈 척하는 거요

translation.en: Ever thought of getting out of this racket and going back to London?
translation.ko: 이런 돈벌이에서 벗어나서 런던에 돌아갈 생각은 안 해봤어요?

translation.en: I hadn't until recently.
The head of our Southeast Asia division just quit.
-Couldn't handle the poverty. -Would you take that job?
translation.ko: 빈곤을 감당할 수 없었대 거기로 가시게요?

translation.en: In a New York minute.
But it must be earned, love. Hence, the return of Singapore.
translation.ko: 근데 그 자리는 따내는 거야 싱가포르를 잡아야 해

translation.en: No pressure there.
Look, I should go back to the office--
-Desert me and you're fired. -Okay.
Now, come on. Let's enjoy this bargain drink,
this impossibly hip DJ, and whatever it is hanging in this room.
Hey, do you think that DJ would do Priya's wedding?
Maybe you should go check. And look out for donors on the way.
Copy that.
Hi.
Mr. DJ?
Um, I'm sorry to interrupt your set, and I don't want to cause offense.
translation.ko: 작업 중에 죄송한데 방해하려는 건 아니고요

translation.en: But is there any chance that you do weddings at all?
Uh, actually, someone's booked me solid on the Indian wedding circuit.
translation.ko: 실은 누가 이미 인도 결혼식 순회공연을 예약해서요

translation.en: [Asha] Ravi?
Sinus infection cleared up?
Um, well, NyQuil.
-So you're-- -Spellbound. Am I right?
-Ravi, this is my boss… -James?
translation.ko: - 라비, 여기는 제 상사… - 제임스 아니세요?

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Yes.
You'd think they'd have nicer cheese at a fancy gig like this.
translation.ko: 고급 파티라 그런가 치즈도 더 맛있네

translation.en: That's butter, dude.
How do you both know each other?
I heard him play a few sets at a club in Ibiza back in my party boy days.
translation.ko: 파티 좀 다닐 때 이비자 클럽에서 유명한 디제이란 소문을 들었어

translation.en: He brought the house down.
-[Ravi and James chuckle] -Clearly.
Okay.
Well, I'm gonna go schmooze.
-I'm gonna-- -Not you.
Enjoy the butter.
Thanks, buddy.
You want to grab some air?
Yeah, uh, I could do air.
Air is good.
Keep it chill. No lasers.
-Have a little faith, Rav. -I have no faith.
Nice to see you, Yoshi.
Nice to see you too. Is your sister still engaged?
[Asha] Yes, she is.
[Yoshi] All right, cool.
How's everyone doing? All right.
DJ Spellbound's a little busy, so Yoshi's in the house.
translation.ko: DJ 스펠바운드가 좀 바빠서 요시가 선곡합니다

translation.en: -So, DJ Spellbound, huh? -Mm-hmm.
-That's not ironic at all. -[chuckles]
You know, it started as joke, but, um, kinda just stuck.
translation.ko: 처음엔 장난으로 지었는데 어쩌다 예명이 돼버렸지

translation.en: So, um, what's your big secret? Why don't you have a real boyfriend?
translation.ko: 그래서 네 비밀은 뭔데? 왜 진짜 남자 친구가 없어?

translation.en: Why don't I have a real boyfriend?
I think it's a legit question here.
Okay, yeah. It is.
After things ended with Krish, I figured why stop there?
translation.ko: 크리슈와 종지부를 찍고 뭐 하러 거기 있나 싶었어

translation.en: So I quit my job, moved to Jersey in the hope of starting over in many ways.
translation.ko: 그래서 직장을 관두고 뉴저지로 와서 여러 의미로 새로 시작했어

translation.en: Of course, my mom thinks I quit banking just to spite her.
translation.ko: 물론 엄마는 내가 엄마 속을 긁으려고 관둔 줄 알아

translation.en: -Did you? -Probably.
So what about you? DJ… ing, how did that happen?
translation.ko: 그러는 넌? DJ라니 어떻게 하게 됐어?

translation.en: You know, my backup skill set is spelling incredibly esoteric words.
translation.ko: 내 능력은 아주 까다로운 철자 맞추기인데

translation.en: Can't really make a living off that.
-Logorrhea. I mean… -Logorrhea.
But no, like, when I was a kid, everything I did was for my parents.
translation.ko: 근데 내가 어렸을 때는 부모님을 위해 살았어

translation.en: Right? Everything. Except music. Music was for me.
translation.ko: 전부, 음악만 빼고 음악만이 내 거였지

translation.en: I mean, music used to make me happy.
But, uh, lately, I don't know. I mean…
I've been on the road for, like, ten years just working nonstop.
I don't know what I'm working for anymore.
I figured I'd take a break, just come back home and fix my family.
translation.ko: 잠깐 쉬면서 집에 와서 가족 문제를 회복하려 했지

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's kind of complicated.
Damn it, Yoshi.
-I'm sorry. I gotta… -Yeah, you gotta go.
-DJ stuff. -Yeah, I gotta… Right.
Are we good?
We're good. We're cool. Yeah.
Great.
Yoshi!
Oh, God.
I can't believe he's Spellbound.
[Asha] Wait, you actually know who he is?
I don't, I'm a nerd, but he's got like a gazillion followers.
translation.ko: 난 샌님이라 잘 모르지만 팔로워가 엄청 많단 건 알아

translation.en: I do not trust DJs.
-[Asha chuckles] -Why? What's wrong with DJs?
I'm sure they're talented. I don't understand what they do, so don't respect it.
translation.ko: 재능은 뛰어나겠지만 뭘 하는지 모르겠어서 존중 못 하겠어

translation.en: -What's he hiding? -I don't think he's hiding anything.
translation.ko: - 뭘 숨기는 거래요? - 숨긴 건 아니고

translation.en: It just never came up.
You've been to a bazillion weddings and never asked him about his background?
translation.ko: 수많은 결혼식에 같이 가놓고 뭐 하는지도 안 물어봤어요?

translation.en: I… I didn't want him to get the wrong idea.
Ash, what if it's not the wrong idea?
translation.ko: 언니, 잘못된 신호가 아닐 수도 있잖아

translation.en: Priya, have you been talking to Mom again?
Let it happen. You want it, sis.
-Shh! -[Priya] But--
What you want…
is a Mumbai Monster.
A Mumbai Monster.
What is it?
It's a masala mojito infused with cumin seeds and Kashmiri chilies.
translation.ko: 쿠민씨와 카슈미리 고추를 넣은 마살라 모히토예요

translation.en: It is…
That good, huh?
Oh my God. That's disgusting.
So what do we know about him?
Okay, he was born in Jersey City and he graduated MIT 2011.
My pal Joby graduated in 2010. I can see what I can find out.
translation.ko: 내 친구 조비가 2010년 졸업생이라 알아봐 줄 수 있어요

translation.en: No, we're not snooping on Ravi.
translation.ko: 아니, 캐고 다니는 건 안 돼요

translation.en: [Nick] It's not snooping.
I'm collecting information about him without him knowing.
If he is gonna join our family, we got to find out who he really is.
translation.ko: 우리 가족이 되려면 어떤 사람인지 알아야죠

translation.en: He's not joining our family, guys, okay? We're just--
You're just more than fake dating.
translation.ko: - 우린 그냥… - 가짜 데이트 그 이상이잖아

translation.en: You like him, admit it.
So Nick, how's the, um… How's the Hindi coming along?
translation.ko: 닉, 그래서 힌디어는 잘 배우고 있어요?

translation.en: [in Hindi] The bride is driving pickles around.
[in English] He's very good.
I said, "It's going great." Right?
Pretty much.
Hey, babe. Maybe you don't need to try so hard to impress Mom and Dad.
translation.ko: 있지, 자기야, 우리 부모님께 딱히 인상 안 남겨도 돼

translation.en: Yes, I do. I do.
Nick, you're a neurosurgeon.
Here's the thing.
A binary craniotomy is nothing compared to planning an Indian wedding.
translation.ko: 개두술은 인도식 결혼에 비하면 아무것도 아니에요

translation.en: And I really want this to go well.
My parents were barely married seven years.
In Indian traditions, the souls are linked for seven lifetimes.
translation.ko: 인도에서는 7번의 생애 동안 영혼이 엮였다고 하잖아요

translation.en: Wow, that's a long time, babe.
It's not nearly enough, pumpkin.
Okay.
[Asha] I am starving!
[Ravi] Me too. Who runs out of food at a wedding? Come on!
translation.ko: 나도, 음식 모자란 결혼식이 어디 있대? 나 참

translation.en: [Asha] There wasn't even a garlic naan in sight. Whoa!
Holy crap, Ravi.
You live here by yourself?
When I'm not traveling, yeah. I don't get to spend much time here, so…
translation.ko: 출장 때만 빼고 여기 있을 때가 많지 않아서

translation.en: It's kind of nice, being at home. Though I did have fun on the road.
translation.ko: 집에 있는 느낌이 좋아 돌아다닐 때도 즐거웠지만

translation.en: [Asha] Yeah, I can see that.
Anyway, you didn't finish your story. So you moved to Jersey… [Asha] Mm-hmm.
translation.ko: 그나저나 얘기 계속해 줘 뉴저지로 이사 왔고

translation.en: Now what?
-Now I change the world. -[Ravi chuckles]
No, but seriously, starting this fund up has been way harder than I expected.
translation.ko: 근데 이 펀드를 시작하는 게 생각보다 훨씬 어렵네

translation.en: Yeah. Well, you know, anything worth doing is hard, right?
translation.ko: 가치 있는 일을 하는 건 어렵잖아

translation.en: I remember when I first started DJing
my parents threatened to stop paying for MIT. It was scary.
So what did you do?
I knew exactly what to do. I panicked.
translation.ko: 난 어떻게 할지 정확히 알았지 우왕좌왕

translation.en: Parents, happiness. Happiness, parents.
Yeah. Here's to not letting them drown that inner voice.
translation.ko: 응, 부모님 때문에 내면의 목소리를 잃지 않기를

translation.en: Although, you know what my inner voice is saying right now?
translation.ko: 근데 내 내면의 목소리가 뭐라고 하게?

translation.en: What?
-Oh my God. -I need Taco Bell.
[chuckles] Okay, every Indian loves Taco Bell.
translation.ko: 그래, 인도계 미국인은 다 타코벨을 사랑하지

translation.en: -[phone chimes] -Give me a sec.
-Where are the plates? -Uh, second cabinet.
translation.ko: - 접시는 어디 있어? - 두 번째 찬장

translation.en: [Asha] Okay.
Yoshi. Um, Good Samaritan needs, like, 27 number eights.
Yeah. Patesh will meet you out back. And don't forget the mango pickle.
translation.ko: 응, 파테시가 뒤쪽으로 나올 거야 망고 피클도 잊지 말고

translation.en: Yeah, and do not be seen again.
All right.
Sorry.
It's okay. Um…
Yoshi works at your parents' restaurant?
Not exactly. You know, he just picks up stuff sometimes.
translation.ko: 그건 아니고 가끔 음식을 받아 와

translation.en: Uh-huh. And then he sends them to food banks.
Sometimes.
[whispers] Sometimes.
What's going on?
All right. Uh, I've been making these huge catering orders from Aroma
translation.ko: 그게… 인도의 향에서 대량 케이터링 주문하고

translation.en: and giving them to homeless shelters, food banks, Little League teams. [scoffs]
translation.ko: 홈리스 쉼터나 푸드 뱅크 어린이 야구 리그 팀들한테 줘

translation.en: Okay, but why through Yoshi?
My dad doesn't know.
You're doing this behind his back. That just feels wrong.
translation.ko: 몰래 하는 거구나 옳지 않은 일 같은데

translation.en: The restaurant is struggling, you know? And he's a stubborn man.
Yeah, anyway. Let's eat.
-I just have one question for you. -Hmm?
Would you like some mango pickle with your quesalupa?
You talking dirty to me?
I am stuffed.
There's another quesalupa with your name on it.
No mas for me.
Shh.
Listen.
What is it?
The sound of no aunties.
No Yoshi.
-No parents. -Mm-hmm.
Nobody left to fool.
I could be making a big mistake hanging out with, like, this cool DJ,
translation.ko: 이 멋진 DJ랑 노는 건 큰 실수일지 몰라

translation.en: who, like, drops beats, turns tables, scratches things.
Yeah, that's me.
I talk a lot when nervous. It's called logorrhea.
-You might've heard of it. -Right.
It's… It's this really long word. I don't know how to spell it…
Did you just kiss me?
Looked like you could use a kiss.
Are we still role-playing?
We're improvising.
Okay.
[scoffs] And I'm boring you. Wow.
Sorry. It's not you.
-Uh-huh. It's the music, right? -Mm-mm.
Yeah, better be the music.
-What does a DJ actually do? -I like to think I make people happy.
translation.ko: DJ는 실제로 뭘 해? 난 사람들을 행복하게 해 준다고 생각해

translation.en: Make people happy?
Mm-hmm. I connect with people. I can feel their energy, you know?
translation.ko: 응, 사람들과 소통하고 에너지도 느낄 수 있어

translation.en: [Ravi] I can tell when their moods are shifting. I can build on it.
translation.ko: 기분이 변하는 걸 느낄 수 있지 내가 주도해서

translation.en: Music's just something that brings people together, you know?
I just love being a part of it. When I was a kid, I used to feel so lost…
translation.ko: 그 틈에 있는 게 좋아 어릴 땐 길을 잃은 기분…

translation.en: [Ravi] Asha?
Okay.
Nice moves.
-Hey! [chuckles] -Hey.
-Good morning. -Good morning.
-How are you feeling? -Great.
-I haven't slept that well in a long time. -Yeah, I noticed.
translation.ko: 그렇게 잘 잔 건 오랜만이었어 눈치챘어

translation.en: Hey, Ravi, about last night. I'm sorry.
You're sorry.
Yeah, that should never have happened.
Right. No, you know, it's probably my fault.
I should apologize. I shouldn't have had you here.
translation.ko: 사과는 내가 해야지 집으로 데려오지 말았어야 했는데

translation.en: -No, Ravi-- -No, I get it. We had a deal.
translation.ko: - 아니, 라비 - 이해해, 우린 계약 연애니까

translation.en: No, Ravi.
I mean that I'm sorry that I fell asleep.
I wish I hadn't. I was having a really nice time.
-Yeah? -Mm-hmm.
Me too.
But maybe we can just keep this to ourselves for a little while.
You want to fake that we're fake dating?
I don't want things to get weird.
Can we at least agree we like each other or…
translation.ko: 최소한 우리 서로 마음이 있는 건 맞지?

translation.en: I don't know.
-I'll take that as a yes. -Mm-hmm.
Though no one can know we really like each other.
translation.ko: 우리가 정말 좋아하는 건 아무도 모르지만

translation.en: Exactly.
-[Ravi] Are you a dancer? -[Asha] Used to be.
♪ We're getting closer But we're trying to be friends ♪
♪ If we start it might never end So we keep tiptoeing ♪
♪ So much at risk And I am scared to lose ♪
-I gotta check that. Sorry. -No, you don't.
-Oh, no, no, no, no, no. -What?
It's James. Singapore's coming back. They're gonna be here in nine hours.
translation.ko: 제임스야, 싱가포르에서 온대 9시간 후면 도착할 거야

translation.en: On a Sunday?
Yeah. I'm not ready. I dropped the ball. I have five years of stories left.
translation.ko: 응, 난 준비가 안 됐어 실패했었잖아 사례가 5년 치나 더 남았는데

translation.en: Asha, I've seen you bust your ass all summer
going through these boxes looking for this story to believe in.
translation.ko: 신뢰할 만한 이야기를 찾느라 상자를 뒤적였잖아

translation.en: I don't wanna overstep, but I don't think you'll find that story in a box.
translation.ko: 주제넘게 나서긴 싫지만 그 상자에는 없을 거 같아

translation.en: What does that mean?
You're the story. Okay?
For what it's worth, I believe in that story like I believe in you.
translation.ko: 내 생각이지만 난 널 믿고 네 이야기를 믿어

translation.en: They'll believe in you.
I'm scared, Ravi.
Everybody's scared.
But you've done the hard work already, right?
Now you just gotta own what you want, listen to your heart,
translation.ko: 이제 원하는 걸 인정하고 마음의 소리를 듣고

translation.en: and just let your love be greater than your fear.
Come here.
You got this.
Ready to clean out the bank of Singapore?
Beat you to it.
Excuse me. You're making progress.
Now, get changed, and let's go knock their Gucci socks off.
translation.ko: 옷 갈아입고 구찌 양말 벗기러 가자

translation.en: I am changed.
Right.
You sure?
Sure.
Thank you.
When I was three years old,
I shocked my parents by calculating a 12% tip on a pizza delivery.
translation.ko: 피자 배달 팁 12%를 단박에 계산해서 부모님이 놀라셨어요

translation.en: Numbers've never failed me.
But today, I am not here to talk about numbers.
translation.ko: 하지만 오늘은 계산 얘기를 하러 온 게 아닙니다

translation.en: I'm here to talk about her.
When we gave Chinda a loan to open her tailor shop,
translation.ko: 저희가 친다에게 재단실을 열 수 있게 대출을 해줬을 때

translation.en: we gave her a new life.
We also gave her daughters the ability to become the first in their family
translation.ko: 친다의 딸들이 가족 중 처음으로 고등학교에 들어갈 수 있게 해줬죠

translation.en: to attend high school.
translation.ko: 가족 중 처음으로 고등학교에 들어갈 수 있게 해줬죠

translation.en: Like Chinda, my grandfather… my dada-ji, also received a loan.
translation.ko: 친다처럼 제 할아버지… 제 다다지도 대출을 받으셨습니다

translation.en: When floods destroyed his crops in the small town called Mirzapur,
translation.ko: 미르자푸르라는 작은 마을에 홍수가 나서 농사를 망치고

translation.en: he moved to Mumbai and borrowed 1000 rupees to buy this boat.
translation.ko: 뭄바이로 이사해서 천 루피를 대출해 이 배를 사셨습니다

translation.en: With the money that he made fishing,
he was able to send my father to Ohio State to study economics,
translation.ko: 아버지를 오하이오 주립대에 보내 경제학을 공부시켰습니다

translation.en: making my dad the first in our family to finish college.
translation.ko: 아버지는 가족 중 처음으로 대학을 졸업하셨죠

translation.en: I am standing in this room today because of this boat
translation.ko: 제가 이 자리에 있을 수 있는 건 그 배 덕입니다

translation.en: and because of the sacrifices that my parents made
translation.ko: 자식들은 더 나은 인생을 살 수 있게

translation.en: to make sure their children had a better life.
Our story is a reminder
translation.ko: 저희 얘기로 떠올릴 수 있을 겁니다

translation.en: that these loans aren't just a chance to change a woman's life,
translation.ko: 이 대출이 한 여성의 인생을 바꿀 기회가 아니라

translation.en: but the chance to change her entire family's future.
translation.ko: 가족 전체의 미래를 바꿀 기회라는 거요

translation.en: Across continents,
for generations to come.
And if we're being honest,
our lives are better when their lives are better.
translation.ko: 그들의 삶이 더 나아질 때 우리네 삶도 나아집니다

translation.en: Or as my father would say,
"A rising tide lifts all boats."
That's the real story here.
The question is, how many stories are we willing to rewrite?
translation.ko: 문제는 이거죠 우린 얼마나 많은 실화를 다시 쓰고 싶은 걸까요?

translation.en: Hey.
Hey yourself.
Thank you.
How can you afford to buy so many of these?
I'm hopelessly addicted to caffeine and prefer not to drink alone.
translation.ko: 어쩔 수 없이 카페인 중독인데 혼자 마시는 건 싫더라

translation.en: Enjoy it while you can.
Wait, what?
Unfortunately, I won't be able to keep you here.
translation.ko: 안타깝지만 자네를 여기 계속 둘 수 없겠어

translation.en: James, I thought we--
You convinced them to invest an additional ten million beyond our ask.
translation.ko: 우리가 바란 투자금보다 1천만 달러를 더 받아냈지

translation.en: What?
Oh my God!
And you're firing me?
Hardly. When I told London the good news,
translation.ko: 그 반대야 런던에 이 소식을 알렸더니

translation.en: they decided to offer the Southeast Asia division to you.
But that's your promotion.
[scoffs] London can wait.
And let's be honest, I couldn't do half the job you will.
translation.ko: 솔직히 난 자네가 해낸 일의 반도 못 했을 거야

translation.en: No, no, no. I can't accept that.
You don't have a choice.
Now, not only did Singapore come through,
but we received an additional massive donation from Red Star
that really got London's attention.
All because of you.
-Red Star? -Another charitable trust.
translation.ko: - 레드 스타요? - 또 다른 자선 신탁이야

translation.en: Ash, when it rains it pours,
translation.ko: 아샤, 비가 올 때는 왕창 쏟아져

translation.en: and our little tin cup runneth over. [chuckles]
It's beautiful, isn't it?
Yes. It is.
Congratulations, Ash.
Now I have to go figure out how to spend all this money. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 난 이제 그 모든 투자금을 어떻게 쓸지 알아봐야겠네

translation.en: James.
Thank you.
It was just coffee.
Priya! Tea's ready. And your phone is dinging.
translation.ko: 프리야! 차 준비됐다 폰 진동 울리네

translation.en: Oh my God. Oh my God. Oh my God. Oh my God!
Okay. Okay. Okay. Okay.
What else could, "I have big news to share," mean, hey?
[chuckles] Yeah, yeah. Yeah.
Yeah. Okay, okay. Listen, listen.
Why don't you come for Sunday lunch, hmm?
Oh yeah, yeah, yeah. Absolutely.
Yeah, do wear a sari.
Okay. And I've already arranged mithai.
Okay, okay. All right. Bye-bye.
Oh, yeah. Thank you. Thank you very much.
What's the occasion?
Just the Shahs coming for lunch.
Accha! Things getting serious, huh?
Hmm, yeah.
A word to the wise.
Don't blindly trust what Ravi's parents say about him.
translation.ko: 라비 부모가 라비에 관해 하는 말 무조건 믿지 마요

translation.en: Fine, theek hai.
Arre, listen.
Just do a background check. You know, college, job, horoscope--
translation.ko: 배경 조사를 하라고요 대학, 직업, 궁합도 보고

translation.en: Ravi graduated from MIT, for God's sake.
-Suneeta, listen. -And he makes my Asha happy.
translation.ko: - 수니타, 들어 봐요 - 아샤를 행복하게 해준다고요

translation.en: Here we go.
Everybody, come. Line up. We'll do the photo.
Yeah, yeah, yeah. Coming. Coming!
-[Suneeta] Come here. -[Vijay] Come on.
[Dinesh] Come, Veena. Okay.
-One, two, three. Say paneer. -[camera beeping]
[all] Paneer!
I can't wait to see their faces!
-Oh, I hear the door. -Okay.
[Suneeta] Shh, shh.
…getting a pet.
[All] Surpri…
Oh, it's you guys.
Namaste. What's the occasion? What are we celebrating?
-I'm Nick. -We're waiting for…
-Oh, I see them coming! Stand over here. -Okay. Okay.
-[Nick] Wait, what's going on? -[both chuckle]
Oh my God.
[all] Surprise!
Look at their faces!
Mom? Dad?
I had no idea that Ravi's parents were joining us for lunch. Hello.
translation.ko: 라비 부모님도 점심 같이 하시는 줄은 몰랐네요, 안녕하세요

translation.en: Oh, your future in-laws don't need a formal invite.
translation.ko: 미래 시댁 식구들인데 정식으로 초대할 필요는 없지

translation.en: Sorry, my what?
Your mom is a bit overexcited.
[Suneeta] For your news, huh?
We wanted to throw a party, but this will do for now.
translation.ko: 파티를 열고 싶었지만 지금은 이 정도로 하자

translation.en: Okay. So tell us your big news!
Oh my God. No, Mom. That's not what this is.
You're not getting engaged?
What? No. Dad, why would you think that?
You and Asha seem so happy, we thought--
And then maybe my mom got a crazy idea?
translation.ko: 저희 엄마가 이상한 생각을 했나 보죠?

translation.en: Suneeta, I told you not to let the bull hit you.
Boy, is that true, Mr. M.
Always with the sayings, Vijay!
Okay, then, so what is this big news?
Singapore, Ma! I got the funding for the loan initiative.
translation.ko: 싱가포르요, 엄마 대출 계획 투자를 받기로 했어요

translation.en: -Oh my God! Congrats! -Hey!
Thank you.
Is that a promotion?
Yes, actually. And a raise.
-[scoffs] -More travel?
You could say that. The position is in the company headquarters in London, so…
translation.ko: 비슷하죠, 본사가 있는 런던으로 가는 자리니까요

translation.en: London, London?
Oh no. London, England, babe.
No. No, no, no, no. I don't accept this. No.
When were you gonna tell me?
Uh, right now. That's literally what this is.
Wow, London. That's, um…
A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
Thanks, Dad.
But look. If you're going to go so far at least get engaged first.
translation.ko: 근데 그렇게 멀리 갈 거면 약혼부터 하렴

translation.en: -Mom! -[Dinesh] I agree.
I could check their horoscopes next week.
No horoscope, none of this nonsense.
I agree. They care for each other. That's all that matters.
Yeah. And Ravi, we know you are a kind, decent, honest boy. Hmm?
translation.ko: 그래, 라비는 친절하고 착하고 정직한 친구잖아

translation.en: Okay, Auntie, it's nice that you say that, but I… I need to tell you something.
translation.ko: 그렇게 말씀하시니 감사한데 드릴 말씀이 있어요

translation.en: -Like, all of you. -[coughs]
Ravi. [chokes]
-Dad? -Dinesh?
-Are you okay? -Get some water.
Are you okay?
Ravi, don't say anything. It's your last chance to be happy!
translation.ko: 라비, 아무 말 하지 마 네가 행복해질 마지막 기회야

translation.en: -Try to relax. -Quickly, quickly!
I'm okay.
Guys, he's fine. He panicked.
Relax, Dinesh. They'll get married in their own time.
translation.ko: 진정해요, 디네시 결혼은 때가 되면 알아서 하겠죠

translation.en: -Dad, stop it. -Whiskey.
Okay. Uncle, that's not the reason he panicked.
He panicked 'cause I was gonna tell you that my biodata, it's all lies.
But who cares? So is mine. Everyone's is.
translation.ko: 그게 뭔 상관이야? 내 것도 거짓이야, 다들 거짓이지

translation.en: Yeah, but Asha, mine is, like--
Yeah, but you did go to MIT. You do run your own company.
translation.ko: 그래도 MIT는 들어갔잖니 네 회사를 운영하는 것도 맞고

translation.en: Okay, come on, Dad. Yeah, I went to MIT. Okay.
I was 16 years old. I didn't know what I was doing.
So I dropped out, by the way.
That must've been very difficult. When did you go back?
I didn't go back, Uncle.
I couldn't. I just…
I needed time to figure out what I wanted, without all the pressure.
translation.ko: 집안의 압박 없이 원하는 걸 찾을 시간이 필요했어요

translation.en: And that time, it…
It saved my life.
So, yeah, I didn't finish college.
But I do have a company.
It's just not a start-up. I'm a DJ.
-[Nick scoffs] -[in Hindi] Hai raam.
[Vijay in English] It's okay.
Why didn't you just tell me?
Asha, I tried to.
He should've come clean way sooner, but it's not a big deal.
translation.ko: 좀 더 빨리 말했어야 하지만 그리 큰 일은 아니야

translation.en: -When we found out, it-- -You and Nick knew about this?
translation.ko: - 우리도 알게 됐을 때… - 너희는 알았어?

translation.en: My buddy Joby told me, yeah.
You didn't think it was important to tell me?
translation.ko: 나한테 알려줘야 한단 생각 안 들었어?

translation.en: Because we like him.
Right?
Oh yeah, no, we like him. Oh yeah, a lot.
Wait a minute. Ravi, you had 15 years to make it right?
Go back to school, get a job, but…
translation.ko: 대학도 졸업하고 직장을 잡을 수 있었지

translation.en: [scoffs] You become a DJ?
Ravi, can this lifestyle support a family?
translation.ko: 라비, 그래서 가족을 부양할 수 있나?

translation.en: Dad, don't ask him that. We're not getting engaged.
translation.ko: 아빠, 묻지 마세요 저희 약혼 안 해요

translation.en: Yeah, Uncle, I can.
[Asha] And why are you even responding?
I don't need anyone to support me. Why is this always about supporting me?
translation.ko: 전 부양받지 않아도 돼요 왜 누가 절 부양해야 해요?

translation.en: Even if I wanted a family, I could do it on my own.
translation.ko: 가족을 원한다 해도 제가 부양할 수 있어요

translation.en: All I would really like is some honesty.
But Asha, wasn't it your idea to pretend to be a couple in the first place?
translation.ko: 근데 아샤, 가짜 연애는 언니 생각 아니었어?

translation.en: -[mothers] What? -Oh my God.
You lied to us, Asha?
How could you do this?
Because of this!
Because you people drive us insane with your pressure. This is what happens!
translation.ko: 여러분이 저희를 미치게 하니까 이런 일이 생기는 거라고요!

translation.en: We are dating now, though.
What's the point of that? You're a DJ. How will you pay for your kids' college?
translation.ko: 그럼 뭐 해? 넌 DJ인데 애들 대학은 어떻게 보내려고?

translation.en: -Mom… -Anyone smell the…
'Cause it smells like burning, so…
I told you! No one wants to marry a bum like you. Now do you see?
translation.ko: 내가 뭐래! 누가 너 같은 놈팡이랑 결혼하고 싶겠어?

translation.en: Don't call my son a bum!
You encouraged this! Okay, Dad, stop.
Let me ask you. Who do you think paid for all the catering orders these last months?
translation.ko: 몇 달간 대량 주문을 한 게 누구라고 생각하세요?

translation.en: -What? -Food banks, homeless shelters, the teams.
-What are you talking about? -Red Star Standard, Dad. Ring a bell?
translation.ko: 무슨 소리냐? 레드 스타 스탠더드요 모르시겠어요?

translation.en: [Dinesh] What about it?
Those are my initials, Dad. That's me, I'm Red Star Standard.
translation.ko: 제 이니셜이잖아요 제가 레드 스타 스탠더드예요

translation.en: Red Star Standard?
That's you?
Yeah. It's this charitable fund I just…
[whispers] Oh my God.
-Asha… -[smoke detector beeping]
[breathes heavily] No one panic. The aloo gobi's on fire.
translation.ko: 다들 놀라지 마세요 알루고비가 타고 있어요

translation.en: [Suneeta] What? Aloo gobi?
-Asha, wait. -[Suneeta] Oh my God! [Asha] Did it ever occur to you to ask?
Why are you so upset?
Oh. [scoffs] How many more surprises do you have for me?
translation.ko: 말 안 한 게 얼마나 더 있는데?

translation.en: I thought this would make you happy.
"You have to own what you want and trust your inner voice?" What the hell?
translation.ko: 원하는 걸 인정하고 내면의 소리를 들으라더니 뭐 하는 짓이야?

translation.en: I meant it.
But you don't think I can do my job on my own.
translation.ko: 근데 내가 내 일도 못 할 것 같았나 보지?

translation.en: Asha, you convinced me it was a good investment--
I wasn't trying to convince you. I needed to do this by myself.
translation.ko: 널 설득하려던 게 아니야 스스로 해야 하는 일이었어

translation.en: I just wanted to help.
Help?
The way you helped your dad? Don't you see that it's so patronizing?
translation.ko: 아버지를 도운 것처럼? 그거 잘난 척인 거 몰라?

translation.en: How do you even have so much money? Rob a bank? Sell endangered species off the back of a van.
translation.ko: 어떻게 그렇게 돈이 많아? 은행 털었어? 멸종 위기종 팔아?

translation.en: No, it's because of Facebook.
-So you did work at a start-up. -Not exactly.
I DJ'd a couple parties for them back in the day and they couldn't pay.
translation.ko: 그 회사 파티에서 디제잉 몇 번 했는데 돈을 못 준다고 대신 주식을 줬어

translation.en: Gave me stock instead.
translation.ko: 돈을 못 준다고 대신 주식을 줬어

translation.en: You made a million bucks DJing some nerd parties?
A lot more, actually. Look, it's no big deal.
translation.ko: 훨씬 더 많이 벌었지 근데 별거 아니야

translation.en: It is a big deal. I am not some cause.
translation.ko: 별거 맞아, 난 기부 대상이 아니야

translation.en: I know that, Asha. I know that.
At least Krish was honest about the fact that he didn't believe in me.
translation.ko: 적어도 크리슈는 날 못 믿는다고 솔직하게 말했어 - 넌 내 뒤통수를 쳤지 - 진심이야?

translation.en: -You did it behind my back. -Seriously?
Let me ask. You ever been honest about a single relationship?
translation.ko: 그러는 넌 한 번이라도 진심으로 연애한 적 있어?

translation.en: -Don't turn this around. -You wanted to role-play.
translation.ko: - 딴 얘기로 돌리지 마 - 연기하고 싶어 했잖아

translation.en: Yeah, and you broke character.
There is a big difference between telling a white lie and being completely untruthful.
translation.ko: 선의의 거짓말과 진짜 거짓에는 큰 차이가 있어

translation.en: Who even are you?
Asha, I'm the guy who went to 14 weddings with you.
Not because I had to. Not because my parents forced me to.
translation.ko: 꼭 가야 해서도 아니고 부모님이 강요해서도 아니었어

translation.en: I went because I genuinely wanted to.
That's the only thing I was untruthful about.
That I didn't have to pretend to be in love with you. Which is what I am, by the way.
translation.ko: 너한테 사랑에 빠진 척할 필요가 없었어, 이미 빠졌으니까

translation.en: I'm in love with you.
I opened my heart to you, Ravi.
Do you know what that took?
And for the record,
I don't care about MIT.
I trusted you, and you let me down.
Hey, Mom.
I can't believe it, beta. You spent thousands on orders through Red Star.
translation.ko: 레드 스타 이름으로 수천 달러어치를 주문했다니

translation.en: He wouldn't let me help you otherwise, so…
translation.ko: 그 방법 외에는 도움을 안 받으셨을 거예요

translation.en: You were always different, even as a child.
translation.ko: 넌 늘 남달랐지, 아주 어릴 적에도

translation.en: And I worried for you.
Mom, what was the point in lying?
Asha and her parents want nothing to do with me now.
translation.ko: 아샤랑 아샤 부모님은 이제 저랑 엮이기 싫대요

translation.en: We were only trying to help.
Do not blame your mom. You met Asha because of that biodata.
translation.ko: 엄마 원망하지 마라 그 프로필 덕에 아샤를 만났지

translation.en: Can't you see?
You're our son. We would lie, die, whatever for your happiness.
translation.ko: 넌 우리 아들이야, 너만 행복하면 거짓말도 하고 죽을 수도 있어

translation.en: Yeah, Dad, but I was happy.
Then you should've kept your mouth shut.
Talk to her.
-She won't take my calls. -Then go to her.
translation.ko: - 전화 안 받을 거예요 - 그럼 직접 가

translation.en: [sighs] It doesn't matter.
I came to tell you I'm going back to work.
translation.ko: 그냥 다시 일하러 간다고 말씀드리러 왔어요

translation.en: Yoshi lined up a bunch of gigs, and I just…
-I think it's time. -Ravi, no.
translation.ko: - 갈 때가 된 거 같아요 - 라비, 안 된다

translation.en: Mom, I am done lying. I'm done pretending to be someone I'm not.
translation.ko: 엄마, 거짓말 안 할래요 저를 꾸미는 짓은 그만할 거예요

translation.en: Again, you're running away the minute things get hard. [scoffs]
Okay. Here's the thing, Dad.
I am not running away.
Okay? This is my job. This is who I am.
I just wish you could see that. I wish that was enough, but clearly not…
translation.ko: 아빠가 알아줬으면 했어요 그거로 충분하길 바랐는데…

translation.en: Ravi, it's not that. We want you--
We want the son we lost when he dropped out of MIT and disappeared.
translation.ko: MIT를 자퇴하고 사라져버린 아들을 원할 뿐이야

translation.en: -We want those years back. -Yeah, but those years are gone, Dad!
translation.ko: - 그 시절을 되찾고 싶어 - 근데 그 시절은 지났잖아요

translation.en: Those years are gone!
But the son you do have is standing right in front of you. I am right here.
translation.ko: 하지만 아버지 자식은 바로 앞에 있다고요, 여기요

translation.en: Okay.
I recommend a flat in Shoreditch.
It's murderously expensive, but you're getting a raise.
They called again to see if you'd signed.
Ash, he's an international DJ. You'll see him again.
translation.ko: 세계적인 DJ야, 또 만날 수 있겠지

translation.en: I don't think so.
Look. I'm sorry. I'm confused.
This guy that you pretended to date and thought was broke,
you actually fell in love with.
Okay. And, it turns out, oh, he's crazy rich.
Not to mention, he helped you get promoted over your boss.
translation.ko: 거기다 상사보다 더 높은 자리로 승진하게 해줬어요

translation.en: He believes in you.
And this is the guy you never wanna see again.
You need to swallow your pride you need to sign that contract,
and then you need to apologize to that boy. It is that simple.
translation.ko: 가서 미안하다고 해요 그렇게 단순한 문제예요

translation.en: -It's not-- -I don't wanna hear it!
You know what's not simple?
Seeing you go.
I'm gonna miss you.
We're gonna miss you.
I'm gonna hate your phony British accent you're obviously gonna come home with.
translation.ko: 분명히 옮아올 가짜 영국 억양이 끔찍하겠지만요

translation.en: But if you let opportunities like this pass you by…
-I'm gonna have to kill you. -[Asha chuckles]
I know people in this town who can make that happen.
-Okay. -If it's really over, why not just go?
translation.ko: - 아는 암살자가 좀 있죠 - 그래 진짜 끝난 거면 그냥 떠나지 왜 망설여?

translation.en: What's holding you back?
translation.ko: 진짜 끝난 거면 그냥 떠나지 왜 망설여?

translation.en: I guess my family, my parents, my sister. I've never left them like this before.
translation.ko: 부모님이나 동생 때문에요 이렇게 두고 간 적은 없어서요

translation.en: We spend so much energy trying to get away from our parents.
translation.ko: 사람들은 부모에게서 벗어나려고 많은 에너지를 쏟지

translation.en: And when we finally get the chance…
It was hard for me to leave Jamaica for London.
translation.ko: 나도 자메이카를 떠나 런던으로 가는 게 쉽지 않았어

translation.en: I didn't want to abandon my parents. In spite of our differences.
translation.ko: 다른 점이 많았음에도 불구하고 부모님을 버리고 싶지 않았지

translation.en: And how did you?
I realized my life is where I take it.
translation.ko: 원하는 걸 이루는 곳에 인생이 있단 걸 깨달았어

translation.en: My parents will always be there for me.
But opportunities like these don't come along every day.
translation.ko: 근데 이런 기회는 매일 오는 게 아니야

translation.en: So this is where you're saving the world.
-Dad? -[exhales] We were just leaving.
Mr. Maurya.
What are you doing here?
You want to go for a walk?
Beta, when I was a young economist, it was a different time.
translation.ko: 베타 내가 젊은 경제 전문가였을 때는 시절이 달랐어

translation.en: White men half as smart as me would get promoted above me.
translation.ko: 나보다 덜 똑똑한 백인들이 내 위로 승진했지

translation.en: I'd get stuck doing their job for them.
You know what my boss said? He said, "Indians? They're smart, sure,
translation.ko: 상사가 뭐라고 했는지 알아? '인도계? 똑똑하긴 하지'

translation.en: but they're numbers guys. They'll never be leaders."
translation.ko: '근데 계산만 잘하지 절대 지도자는 못 돼'

translation.en: I know. Makes me so mad. I'm sorry you had to go through that, Dad.
translation.ko: 알아요, 아주 열받죠 그런 시절을 겪으셔서 맘이 아파요

translation.en: Which is why I was so worried that you were being too idealistic.
translation.ko: 그래서 네가 너무 이상주의라 걱정스러운 거야

translation.en: I didn't want you to face the same disappointment I had.
translation.ko: 내가 겪었던 실망을 맞닥뜨리지 않았으면 했지

translation.en: But, um, look at you.
You did it.
Bigger numbers than I ever dreamt of.
translation.ko: 내가 꿈꾸던 것보다 더 큰 숫자야

translation.en: And you know what makes me the most proud?
That you did it on your own terms.
Jah, beti. Go to London. You deserve it.
translation.ko: 자, 베티, 런던으로 가렴 넌 그럴 자격이 있어

translation.en: -[sighs] -Go have the experience of a lifetime.
For me.
I'm sorry that I lied to you.
I'm sorry we drove you crazy.
-I blame it on your mother. -[Asha giggles]
I think I have time for some ice cream.
translation.ko: 아이스크림 먹을 시간은 있는 거 같아요

translation.en: What kind of job is this?
Offo, where is your sister?
Getting her makeup done. Relax.
Hai Bhagwan. Why is she only wearing one necklace?
'Cause she's not Mr. T, Ma.
Well, she's late now. Call and see what time they left their home.
translation.ko: 늦겠다, 전화해서 둘이 언제 나왔나 물어봐

translation.en: Their home? What do you mean "their home"?
You think I was born yesterday. I know about the boyfriends.
translation.ko: 내가 아무것도 모를 줄 아니? 남자 친구들 얘기 안다

translation.en: The sneaking around at night.
And the fact that Nick and Priya live together.
And yet you didn't say anything. That is very unlike you.
translation.ko: 근데도 아무 말 안 하셨네요 전혀 엄마 같지 않은데요

translation.en: I wanted her to tell me. I wanted my daughters to tell me everything.
translation.ko: 프리야가 말해 줬으면 했어 딸들이 다 말해주길 바랐지

translation.en: Well, you know, Ma, that we've always wanted to.
translation.ko: 있죠, 엄마 우리도 항상 말하고 싶었어요

translation.en: We just didn't know how.
We never really speak about that stuff in our family.
translation.ko: 우리 가족은 그런 얘기를 잘 안 하잖아요

translation.en: You never really even told me about your life before I was born.
translation.ko: 제가 태어나기 전에 엄마는 어땠는지도 말해 주신 적 없고요

translation.en: What is there to tell? I drove my parents crazy, just like you.
translation.ko: 할 말이 뭐 있어? 나도 너처럼 부모님을 미치게 했지

translation.en: I find that very hard to believe.
-I also know you found that photo. -Of you and that boy?
translation.ko: - 네가 그 사진 찾은 거 알아 - 남자랑 같이 찍은 사진요?

translation.en: Parag and I were neighbors. Our fathers were old friends.
translation.ko: 파라그와 난 이웃이었어 아버지끼리 오랜 친구셨지

translation.en: When Parag would come for tea with his father,
we would sit in the garden and talk for hours.
translation.ko: 정원에 같이 앉아서 몇 시간을 얘기했어

translation.en: Of course, we fell in love.
When it came time to arrange my marriage, I told my parents about him,
translation.ko: 결혼할 나이가 됐을 때 부모님께 말씀드렸는데 허락하지 않으셨어

translation.en: but they forbade it.
He was from a different caste, they said.
My father never spoke to Parag's family again.
translation.ko: 아버지는 다시는 파라그의 가족과 얘기도 하지 않으셨어

translation.en: My parents arranged a shaadi for me to your father and my fate was sealed.
translation.ko: 부모님이 네 아빠와의 결혼을 정했고 그렇게 내 운명이 정해진 거야

translation.en: Mom.
That must have been so heartbreaking.
It was.
[chuckles] At first, I pretended to love your dad.
But eventually, I didn't need to pretend anymore.
And now I have you girls and this beautiful life.
translation.ko: 이젠 우리 딸들이 있고 아름다운 인생도 있지

translation.en: Do you ever think about him?
Oh yeah, from time to time.
I told myself, if I ever had daughters, I would let them choose their fate, their happiness.
translation.ko: 나한테 딸이 생기면 알아서 결정하게 해주겠다고 다짐했어

translation.en: Yeah, as long as we have five MBAs, choose a nice guy, and make round rotis.
translation.ko: 그렇겠죠 MBA 5개에 좋은 남자를 고르고 로티를 둥글게 만들 줄 알면요

translation.en: -This looks good. You should wear this. -This isn't Game of Thrones.
Listen to you, Miss Taco Bell. When have you even made one roti?
translation.ko: 그리고 웃긴다, 타코벨 아가씨 네가 언제 로티 하나라도 만들었어?

translation.en: -I made, like, a quarter once. -Yeah, once.
translation.ko: - 1/4 크기로 한 번 만들었죠 - 그래, 한 번

translation.en: Oh, beta. I hate to see you go to London.
translation.ko: 베타, 네가 런던에 가는 게 싫어

translation.en: But that is your fate.
And darling, I know Ravi's not perfect, but I feel he's your happiness.
translation.ko: 그리고 아샤 라비가 완벽하진 않지만 널 행복하게 해주는 사람 같아

translation.en: I see the way he looks at you.
It's exactly the same way your father's looked at me since the day we met.
translation.ko: 날 처음 만났을 때의 네 아빠 눈빛과 판박이더라

translation.en: -Why are you sitting around? Priya's gone! -What?
She's didn't show up for makeup and her phone is off.
translation.ko: 메이크업 샵에 안 왔대 전화기도 꺼져 있고

translation.en: She was supposed to do that an hour ago.
Calm down. She's gotta be here somewhere. Let's split up.
translation.ko: 진정해요, 어딘가 있을 거예요 흩어져서 찾아요

translation.en: Should've had sons.
Vijay, call 911!
-I go this way, you that way. -Yeah, okay.
translation.ko: - 난 이쪽, 당신은 저쪽으로 가 - 알겠어

translation.en: -Priya? -[Vijay] Priya?
-[women shriek] -Ah! Sorry, Aunties.
Priya!
-Pri! -Darling?
-[occupant yells] -Sorry! How many bathrooms are there?
translation.ko: 미안해요, 대체 여기는 화장실이 몇 개야?

translation.en: Priya? Priya, beta!
Don't worry, everything's fine. Priya!
translation.ko: 걱정 마요, 아무 문제 없어요 프리야!

translation.en: -Asha. -Nick?
-I need help. -Have you seen Priya?
translation.ko: - 닉? - 도움이 필요해요 - 프리야 봤어요? - 프리야요?

translation.en: -Priya? -Yes!
-No. Wait, I need your… -[groans] Priya! Pri?
Pri?
-Pri, is that you? -[Priya] No. [sobs]
-Want to talk about it? -[Priya] No!
Uh, okay, I don't mean to rush you, but your guests have started to arrive.
translation.ko: 보채는 건 아닌데 하객들이 오기 시작했어

translation.en: [Priya] I don't care!
Come on, open up. It's only me.
[Priya] It's fricking open.
-What is going on here? -[grunts]
I didn't want the ice sculptures. I didn't…
I didn't want the gold-leaf cake, and why can't he just wear a tuxedo?
translation.ko: 금박 케이크도 싫었고 왜 그이는 턱시도를 안 입어?

translation.en: Okay, Dr. Priya, time for a little chat.
translation.ko: 그래, 프리야 박사님 얘기 좀 하자

translation.en: He won't even tell me what his big surprise is.
translation.ko: 깜짝 이벤트가 뭔지도 말 안 해줘

translation.en: Then it wouldn't be a surprise, would it?
I don't think this is about cakes or ice sculptures or surprises.
translation.ko: 케이크나 얼음 조각상이나 깜짝 이벤트 때문이 아니잖아

translation.en: -I think this is about you. -How is this possibly about me?
translation.ko: - 네 문제 같아 - 어떻게 내 문제인데?

translation.en: For some reason, I think this whole seven lifetimes thing has you kind of freaked out.
translation.ko: 7번의 생애 같은 말 때문에 두려움을 느낀 거 같은데

translation.en: It just got me thinking.
Every generation in our family has done this for centuries.
translation.ko: 우리 가문 모든 세대가 수 세기 동안 결혼을 했는데

translation.en: What if I'm the first one to screw it up?
translation.ko: 그걸 제일 처음 망치는 게 나면 어떡해?

translation.en: You don't have to worry. I already screwed it up.
But I'm the first one to marry someone who isn't Indian.
translation.ko: 근데 인도계가 아닌 사람과 결혼하는 사람은 내가 처음이야

translation.en: Is that what this is about? 'Cause Nick is way more Indian than we are.
translation.ko: 그거 때문이었어? 닉은 우리보다 훨씬 인도인 같거든

translation.en: Are you seriously gonna say that to me? How's that supposed to make me feel…
translation.ko: 진심으로 이러기야? 그럼 내 기분이 어떻겠어

translation.en: I know. Listen, listen, listen.
-[sobs] -Nick is crazy about you.
Okay? I mean, otherwise he wouldn't be dressed the way he is.
translation.ko: 알겠어? 안 그러면 지금 그런 복장을 하고 있지 않겠지

translation.en: -How's he dressed? -Doesn't matter.
What matters is that he loves you.
translation.ko: 중요한 건 닉이 널 사랑한다는 거야

translation.en: And Mom and Dad love him.
Or at least, they will learn to.
The only question that remains is, do you?
But I'm scared.
We're all scared.
If you don't marry Nick today,
you're gonna regret it for the rest of your life.
Pri, you have a chance to live your life the way you want to.
translation.ko: 프리, 넌 네 맘대로 살 기회가 있어

translation.en: So just tune out the noise.
Listen to your heart.
Let your love be greater than your fear.
[chuckles] That's beautiful, Ash.
-Did you come up with that yourself? -Yep.
No.
It was someone a little bit smarter than me.
We need to get you into makeup. Now.
-Really? -Yes, really. You should see your face.
translation.ko: - 그래? - 응, 네 얼굴 좀 봐

translation.en: God!
Priya! Thank God! Quickly, let's get you ready and dressed.
translation.ko: 프리야! 세상에 얼른 준비하고 옷 입어

translation.en: -Have you been drinking? -No.
Yes. Get her some coffee.
Wait, wait, no. Let's get you dressed.
There's something I need to do first.
-Where you going? -Don't worry, I'll be back.
translation.ko: - 어디 가? - 걱정 마요, 금방 올게요

translation.en: Hai raam! I can smell the Pinot Grigio on you.
translation.ko: 하이 람! 와인 냄새를 풀풀 풍기네

translation.en: -I know. I was 12 years old. -Oh my God.
And so, I'm alone with this person who's driving me crazy.
translation.ko: 날 미치게 하는 사람과 단둘이 있게 됐어

translation.en: I had to walk home. Can you imagine that?
-And I decided to keep it. -Ravi?
-Asha. What're you doing here? -I was an idiot. I owe you an apology.
translation.ko: - 아샤! 어쩐 일이야? - 내가 바보였어, 사과할게

translation.en: Asha, you don't have to--
I never had a chance to thank you. For going along with my crazy scheme.
translation.ko: 고맙단 말을 못 했어 내 계획에 장단 맞춰준 거

translation.en: For teaching me how to drop beats and turn tables.
translation.ko: 비트를 찍고 턴테이블을 쓰는 법 알려준 거

translation.en: For donating 50 years' worth of Indian takeout to my work.
translation.ko: 인도 포장 음식값 50년어치를 기부해 준 거

translation.en: I know it came from your heart.
Because everything you do comes from your heart.
translation.ko: 네가 하는 모든 건 마음에서 우러나온 거니까

translation.en: [inhales] And I was wrong to say you didn't believe in me.
translation.ko: 네가 날 안 믿는단 말은 틀린 말이었어

translation.en: [whispers] I'm sorry.
Ash…
Um, Ravi, who is this?
[Asha] Doesn't matter.
What matters is this is a great guy, you know?
translation.ko: 중요한 건 라비가 좋은 사람이란 거예요

translation.en: He's brilliant. He's kind. He's a true original.
He might seem like a bit of a slacker at first.
I thought so too.
And you should never play him at Bananagrams. Ever.
As you get to know him, he grows on you.
translation.ko: 라비를 알아갈수록 더 좋아하게 될 거예요

translation.en: And if you're not too blind,
you'll find he's the kind of guy you want cheering you on.
translation.ko: 이 사람의 응원을 받고 싶다고 생각하게 될 거예요

translation.en: Always.
Ash.
-Asha. -[woman] Go.
-Go! -Asha!
It's not what you think!
Asha. Asha, wait!
-[Vijay] Everything's gonna be fine. -Why do you keep saying that?
translation.ko: - 다 괜찮아 - 왜 계속 그렇게 말하세요?

translation.en: Why do you keep telling me to calm down. This is serious.
People are listening.
-Why are we here? -Thank God you're here.
translation.ko: - 우린 왜 여기 서 있는데요? - 드디어 왔구나

translation.en: Great. Now we need the groom.
Where's Nick?
-You haven't seen him? -No. Why?
This is a disaster!
If this is his surprise, this is not funny.
This white guy is taking Indian Standard Time to a new level.
translation.ko: 백인 사위가 인디언 타임의 역사를 새로 쓰네

translation.en: [Priya] How could he just disappear?
-I did see him before and he-- -He what?
He was asking for help.
-You didn't help him? -I was looking for you!
-God, our daughters will never marry! -Ma. Come on.
translation.ko: - 우리 딸들은 결혼 못 하나 봐 - 엄마, 그러지 마요

translation.en: Is that an elephant?
[in English] Oh. My. God.
[in Hindi] Welcome, Spice Girls!
Priya.
You are a dead onion.
With you, I'm a thin banana.
-[in English] Did I… I said… -No.
-No? -No.
My God, I'm so sorry I was so late.
I know you didn't want a whole thing, and I did a whole thing.
translation.ko: 자기는 이런 거 하나도 바라지 않았는데 내가 해버렸지

translation.en: It was perfect.
I love you so much.
[Asha] Come on, let's get you married!
Congratulations, guys. Whoo!
And congratulations to my mom and dad too, for staying out of their way.
translation.ko: 엄마, 아빠도 둘 사이를 방해하지 않은 거 감사드리고요

translation.en: -Mostly. -Little bit.
One thing that I have learned about love…
is that it's a lot like moving to a new country.
Trying to build something where nothing existed before.
translation.ko: 아무것도 없던 곳에 뭔가를 짓는 거죠

translation.en: It's hanging on and letting go.
It's messy, it's beautiful,
like any giant leap of faith.
So congratulations to the two of you for taking that leap.
translation.ko: 둘이 확신의 길을 걷는 걸 정말 축하해

translation.en: May you take many more. I love you.
-Cheers to Nick and Priya! -Cheers!
Cheers.
[Priya] Thank you.
Aw! You're welcome.
[Asha] I love you guys.
[Priya] Thank you, Ash.
You could get married too.
-[Priya] I love you. -Mom!
And thank you to everyone who celebrated with us today.
translation.ko: 저희를 축하하러 와주신 모든 분께 감사드려요

translation.en: But we have a surprise for you.
I am honored to invite
our own DJ Spellbound!
That's Ravi!
Look, Asha, that's Ravi.
You have to say something to them.
Stop the music! Stop the music!
What in God's name is going on? Pinky, please sit down.
Suneeta, Vijay, it is my duty to tell you that this boy is a fraud.
translation.ko: 수니타, 비자이 이 말씀은 꼭 드려야겠네요 저 친구는 사기꾼이라고요

translation.en: -Pinky, it's okay. -I tried to warn you.
No, no, no. Pinky, enough.
Enough.
You need to let this go.
Maybe it's time we learn something from our kids and leave the shame behind.
translation.ko: 애들한테 교훈을 배울 차례인지도 몰라요 불명예는 뒤로하고요

translation.en: [auntie] Pinky, it's over. Come.
[chuckles] Sorry. She's a little drunk.
Um, if I may, uh…
Pinky Auntie's right.
I haven't been honest about who I am for a very, very long time.
translation.ko: 제 본모습에 대해 오랫동안 솔직하지 못했어요

translation.en: It's okay, Ravi.
Thank you, Uncle, but I'm sorry, um…
Not for me. For the people I've hurt.
translation.ko: 절 위해서가 아니라 제가 상처 준 사람들을 위해서예요

translation.en: Especially you, Asha.
And to you, Nick and Priya.
I, uh, know a wedding isn't the place for this, but I, um…
translation.ko: 결혼식이 이런 얘기를 할 자리가 아니란 건 알지만

translation.en: -Dad, just-- -Please.
-What are you doing? -Let me speak. Let me speak.
Yes. Ravi did not graduate from MIT. He does not have a start-up.
translation.ko: 그래요 라비는 MIT 졸업생이 아니고 스타트업 대표도 아니에요

translation.en: -Is there a point? What are you doing? -Yes.
The point is that it doesn't matter.
I, we…
are very proud that you're our son.
Thanks, Dad.
[Dinesh] Okay, enough.
Asha, I'm sorry I wasn't more honest with you.
Reality is, I've never had truer feelings than when I was pretending to date you.
translation.ko: 연애하는 척할 때보다 더 진실한 감정을 느낀 적은 없었어

translation.en: I wasn't even really pretending.
Asha, you're gonna change the world.
That beautiful mind and that big heart.
I just hope there's room for me in it. Someday.
translation.ko: 언젠가는 거기 내가 들어갈 자리가 있으면 좋겠어

translation.en: What about her?
Me?
That's Pihu. Um, she's my cousin.
[Ravi] Say hi, Pihu.
Hi.
Come here.
[Vijay whispers] Go.
Whoo! Yay! [chuckles] Yes!
-[Nick] Yeah! -[Priya] Finally!
[Asha] My name is Asha Maurya.
And I have a joyous appetite for life.
I am a natural in the kitchen.
And yearn to have a family to feed.
I save the world by day.
But live a quiet, traditional life by night.
translation.ko: 하지만 밤에는 조용하고 전통적인 삶을 살죠

translation.en: At heart, I'm just a simple girl whose hobbies include fine dining
translation.ko: 실은 단순한 여자로 고급 요리 먹기와

translation.en: and relaxing at home.
Seeking my Indian Prince Charming with a freelance job and a heart of gold.
translation.ko: 완벽한 인도계 남편을 찾아요 프리랜서에 상냥한 사람으로요

translation.en: I love weddings and dream of having a grand one of my own someday.
translation.ko: 결혼식을 사랑하며 언젠가 성대한 결혼식을 올리는 게 꿈이에요

translation.en: Maybe.
I think.
